title: Diablo Immortal arriving on iOS devices in June, features cross-play and cross-progression
content:
Today, Blizzard announced that Diablo Immortal, a new Diablo entry designed for mobile devices, will launch on June 2 for iOS and Android devices with a PC version coming at a later date. Here’s everything you need to know about the game.

more…

The post Diablo Immortal arriving on iOS devices in June, features cross-play and cross-progression appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Today, Blizzard announced that Diablo Immortal, a new Diablo entry designed for mobile devices, will launch on June 2 for iOS devices.
